Question: This person was able to pick out each note, and perfect his playing.
Hints: This person learned how to play the banjo with help from John McEuen, who later joined the Nitty Gritty Dirt Band.
It was originally entitled The Three Caballeros and this person was to be teamed with Dan Aykroyd and John Belushi.
This person did his stand-up routine opening for the band in the early 1970s.
